subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Daniele Bennati of Italy won the opening leg yesterday of the Vuelta a España, cycling’s most important race after the Tour de France and the Giro d’Italia.Bennati, a Lampre-Fondital rider, sprinted ahead of the pack to finish the 95-mile course in 3 hours 43 minutes 9 seconds in and around Vigo, a port city.
